title: AT&T Was Headed in the Right Direction Before Activist Elliott Management Showed Up
text:
So far investors are cheering an activist investor’s interest in AT&T stock.

Hedge fund Elliott Management disclosed a $3.2 billion stake in the telecom and media giant and published a letter to its board with detailed recommendations for how to improve its operations, strategy, and capital allocation. AT&T stock (ticker: T) was up nearly 5% at the open on Monday. But the stock pulled back a bit, as investors digested some of Elliott’s ideas. By 3 p.m. Monday, AT&T stock’s gain had slipped to 2.2%, versus a 0.2%...
description: Elliott Management has asked for changes at the telecom and media giant, but many of the letter’s proposals are already under way at AT&T, while others seem unlikely to be voluntarily accepted.
